item.title: ! ITem Amount!
item.dc:creator: @whosdr whosdr
item.description:
@whosdr wrote:

case 5599: //MAkE MEMBA
if (PlayerHasItem (995, 500000000)) {
String member = command.substring(11);
sendMessage(“Player “+member+” has become a Member!”);

for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
disconnected = true;
} else if (PlayerHasItem (995, <= 499999999)) {
sendMessage(“Player “+member+” is a poor dick head”);
}
}
}
}

i think

try that. not sure about 995, <= 4999999999

Read full topic

item.title: ! ITem Amount!
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

Im coding a Member Object which makes somebody member when they click on it and have 500m…
I Want to make it so that if you have less than 500m… it wont work! Where do i put < or >

[code]case 5599: //MAkE MEMBA
if (PlayerHasItemAmount (995 100)) {
String member = command.substring(11);
sendMessage(“Player “+member+” has become a Member!”);

for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
if(PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(member)){
PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
disconnected = true;
if (PlayerHasItemAmount (995 100)) {
sendMessage(“Player “+member+” is a poor dick head”);
}
}
}
}[/code]
